entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 late this afternoon. High zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 17.
